pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Statistics for 2D/3D Transformations // Fits 2D and 3D geometric transformations via 'Stan' probabilistic programming engine ( Stan Development Team (2021) https://mc-stan.org). Returns posterior distribution for individual parameters of the fitted distribution. Allows for computation of LOO and WAIC information criteria (Vehtari A, Gelman A, Gabry J (2017) doi:10.1007/s11222-016-9696-4) as well as Bayesian R-squared (Gelman A, Goodrich B, Gabry J, and Vehtari A (2018) doi:10.1080/00031305.2018.1549100).
